reviews.review: I wasn’t to thrilled about the songs the storyline was nice but the original captured my heart this was a nice follow up but not as engaging as the original
The movie was amazing, saw it twice already. My kids and I loved it. The Show Yourself scene was incredible.
I loved the movie!! Just like the first one alittle bit more. This is the best sequel to come out of Disney animation studios ever

Nice, it’s been a while, but I remember liking the 1st one a lot more. This story was interesting, but they broke into song a lot and the songs weren’t as memorable. My 3 yr old granddaughter was entertained but it was more predictable and not as suspenseful as the original. Still worth seeing.
It was so much better then the frist frozen

The movie is marvelous. I felt like a kid 
It was fun and touching just perfect

The movie was a little underwhelming and did not live up to my expectations. If you are watching it with kids, they will certainly love it; however, if you are an adult, while you will be entertained, you might find the story a little underwhelming. It does a good job of being a not-bad-but-not-nice-either sequel to a blockbuster first movie, so fans of the first movie would definitely enjoy seeing the characters on screen again. If you thought the first movie was just okay (not great, but okay), then you will definitely find this movie quite underwhelming.
My another gripe was with the horse. I am talking about the magical horse they had Elsa facing in the film's poster. Given the horse's prominence in the poster and the ominous look they gave it, I thought it would play an essential role to the plot. Turned out the horse was not central to the story at all (though it does have at least one part where it plays the Elsa's sidekick).
I was not happy that they were making a sequel. The first one was awesome, how could they top it? This one wasn't as awesome, but I REALLY liked it. Very comical. I'm glad I was wrong.
Absolute Must See!!!! I laughed and cried and then I laughed and cried again. ❤
